i KNOW I ASK ALOT BUT HOW CAN  U CHANGE YOUR USERNAMME ONLINE I DOWNLOAD GARENA AND XFIRE NOT ONE THEM THE NAME AND XFIRE DOES NOT DETECT THE L4D 2 AT ALL  AND GARENA DOES NOTHING CAN YOU HELP

Change Name:
Open Console Type "Name YourName" you have to do that every time you join the game to change that go to your game folder Default is
"C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Left 4 Dead 2\left4dead2\cfg"

Game Root Folder open "left4dead2" open "cfg" Find "autoexec.cfg" open it with notepad find "name Play-Shqip.com" (Line 71) Remove "name Play-Shqip.com" set your name in game that's all

xFire:
If you have Steam installed and you installed the game on Default Folder 
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Left 4 Dead 2\
xFire will Automatically Detects the game
If Not open xFire go to Tools -> Options select "Games" Tab  Expand "Not Installed" Find "Left 4 Dead 2" select manual setup select Path
You need to have Steam.exe 
Installed Path\Steam\Steam.exe
Installed Path\Steam\steamapps\common\Left 4 Dead 2\Game Root
